T06sthtvbhu:4: tathā hy ātmadṛṣṭiprabhavā rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ pudgalanairātmyāvabodhaś ca satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ pratipakṣatvāt tatprahāṇāya pravartamānaḥ sarvakleśān prajahāti /
T06sthtvbhu:7: kleśā hi mokṣaprāpter āvaraṇam iti atas teṣu prahīṇeṣu mokṣo 'dhigamyate /
T06sthtvbhu:8: jñeyāvaraṇam api sarvasmin jñeye jñānapravṛttipratibandhabhūtam akliṣṭam ajñānam /
T06sthtvbhu:9: tasmin prahīṇe sarvākāre jñeye 'saktam apratihatañ ca jñānaṃ pravartata ity ataḥ sarvajñatvam adhigamyate /
T06sthtvbhu:10: atha vā dharmapudgalābhiniviṣṭāś cittamātraṃ yathābhūtaṃ na jānantīty ato dharmapudgalanairātmyapradarśanena saphale vijñaptimātre 'nupūrveṇa praveśārthaṃ prakaraṇārambhaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:11: atha vā vijñānavad vijñeyam api dravyata eveti kecin manyante /
T06sthtvbhu:12: vijñeyavad vijñānam api saṃvṛtita eva na paramārthata ity asya dviprakārasyāpy ekāntavādasya pratiṣedhārthaḥ prakaraṇārambhaḥ //
T06sthtvbhu:20: ātmā jīvo jantur manujo māṇava ity evamādika ātmopacāraḥ skandhā dhātava āyatanāni rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam ity evamādiko dharmopacāraḥ
T06sthtvbhu:21: ayaṃ dviprakāro 'py upacāro vijñānapariṇāma eva na mukhye ātmani dharmeṣu ceti /
T06sthtvbhu:23: dharmāṇām ātmanaś ca vijñānapariṇāmād bahir abhāvāt /
T06sthtvbhu:27: tatrātmādivikalpavāsanāparipoṣād rūpādivikalpavāsanāparipoṣāc cālayavijñānād ātmādinirbhāso vikalpo rūpādinirbhāsaś cotpadyate /
T06sthtvbhu:28: [Tvbh_42] tam ātmādinirbhāsaṃ rūpādinirbhāsañ ca tasmād vikalpād bahirbhūtam ivopādāyātmādyupacāro rūpādidharmopacāraś cānādikālikaḥ pravartate vināpi bāhyenātmanā dharmaiś ca /
T06sthtvbhu:30: yac ca yatra nāsti tat tatropacaryate /
T06sthtvbhu:32: evaṃ vijñānasvarūpe bahiś cātmadharmābhāvāt parikalpita evātmā dharmāś ca na tu paramārthataḥ santīti vijñānavad vijñeyam api dravyata evety ayam ekāntavādo nābhyupeyaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:33: upacārasya ca nirādhārasyāsaṃbhavād avaśyaṃ vijñānapariṇāmo vastuto 'stīty upagantavyo yatrātmadharmopacāraḥ pravartate /
T06sthtvbhu:34: ataś cāyam abhyupagamo na yuktikṣamo vijñānam api vijñeyavat saṃvṛtita eva na paramārthata iti /
T06sthtvbhu:35: saṃvṛtito 'py abhāvaprasaṅgān na hi saṃvṛtir nirupādānā yujyate /
T06sthtvbhu:36: tasmād ayam ekāntavādo dviprakāro 'pi niryuktikatvāt tyājya ity ācāryavacanam /
T06sthtvbhu:37: evañ ca sarvaṃ vijñeyaṃ parikalpitasvabhāvatvād vastuto na vidyate vijñānaṃ punaḥ pratītyasamutpannatvād dravyato 'stīty abhyupeyam /
T06sthtvbhu:39: katham etad gamyate vinā bāhyenārthena vijñānam evārthākāram utpadyata iti /
T06sthtvbhu:40: bāhyo hy arthaḥ svābhāsavijñānajanakatvena vijñānasyālambanapratyaya iṣyate na kāraṇatvamātreṇa samanantarādipratyayād viśeṣāprasaṅgāt /
T06sthtvbhu:42: na ca sañcitam avayavasaṃhatimātrād anyad vidyate /
T06sthtvbhu:44: tasmād vinaiva bāhyenārthena vijñānaṃ sañcitākāram utpadyate /
T06sthtvbhu:45: na ca paramāṇava eva saṃcitās tasyālambanaṃ paramāṇūnām atadākāratvāt /
T06sthtvbhu:46: na hy asañcitāvasthātaḥ sañcitāvasthāyāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ kaścid ātmātiśayaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:47: tasmād asañcitavat sañcitā api paramāṇavo naivālambanam /
T06sthtvbhu:49: ekaika paramāṇur anyanirapekṣyo 'tīndriyo bahavas tu parasparāpekṣā indriyagrāhyāḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:50: teṣām api sāpekṣanirapekṣāvasthayor ātmātiśayābhāvād ekāntenendriyagrāhyatvam atīndriyatvaṃ vā /
T06sthtvbhu:51: yadi ca paramāṇava eva parasparāpekṣā vijñānasya viṣayībhavanti /
T06sthtvbhu:52: evaṃ sati yo 'yaṃ ghaṭakuḍyādyākārabhedo vijñāne sa na syāt praramāṇūnām atadākāratvāt /
T06sthtvbhu:54: na ca paramāṇavaḥ stambhādivat paramārthataḥ santy/
T06sthtvbhu:56: tadanabhyupagame vā pūrvadakṣiṇāparottarādidigbhedo yaḥ sa paramāṇor na syāt /
T06sthtvbhu:57: tataś ca vijñānavat paramāṇor apy amūrtatvam adeśasthatvañ ca prasajyate /
T06sthtvbhu:58: evaṃ bāhyārthābhāvād vijñānam evārthākāram utpadyate svapnavijñānavad ity abhyupeyam /
T06sthtvbhu:60: na ca vartamānā vartamānajanakā utpadyamānāvasthāyām asattvāt /
T06sthtvbhu:61: [Tvbh_46] utpannāvasthāyāṃ vijñānasyāpi tadākāreṇotpannatvān na kiñcit kartavyam astīti manovijñānam apy anālambanam evotpadyate /
T06sthtvbhu:63: asaty ātmani mukhye dharmeṣu copacāro na yujyate /
T06sthtvbhu:64: upacāro hi triṣu satsu bhavati nānyatamābhāve mukhyapadārthe tatsadṛśe 'nyasmin viṣaye tayoś ca sādṛśye /
T06sthtvbhu:65: tad yathā mukhye 'gnau tatsadṛśe ca māṇavake tayoś ca sādhāraṇe dharme kapilatve tīkṣṇatve vā saty agnir māṇavaka ity upacāraḥ kriyate /
T06sthtvbhu:66: atra hy agnir māṇavaka iti jātir dravyaṃ vopacaryate /
T06sthtvbhu:68: tatra tāvan na jāteḥ sādhāraṇaṃ kapilatvaṃ tīkṣṇatvaṃ vā /
T06sthtvbhu:69: na ca sādhāraṇadharmābhāve māṇavake jāter upacāro yujyate 'tiprasaṅgāt /
T06sthtvbhu:72: jātyabhāve 'pi tīkṣṇatvakapilatvayor māṇavake darśanād avinābhāvitvam ayuktam /
T06sthtvbhu:76: na hi yo 'gnes tīkṣṇo guṇaḥ kapilo vā sa eva māṇavake /
T06sthtvbhu:78: viśeṣasya svāśrayapratibaddhatvān na vināgniguṇenāgner māṇavake upacāro yuktaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:80: evam apy agniguṇasyaiva tīkṣṇasya kapilasya vā māṇavakaguṇe tīkṣṇe kapile vā sādṛśyād upacāro yukto na tu māṇavake 'gner guṇasādṛśyenāsaṃbandhāt
T06sthtvbhu:83: pradhāne hi guṇarūpeṇaiva jñānābhidhāne pravartete tatsvarūpāsaṃsparśāt /
T06sthtvbhu:85: na hi jñānābhidhānavyatirikto 'nyaḥ padārthasvarūpaparicchittyupāyo 'stīty ataḥ pradhānasvarūpaviṣayajñānābhidhānābhāvān naiva mukhyaḥ padārtho 'stīty avagantavyam /
T06sthtvbhu:86: evaṃ yāvac chabde saṃbandhābhāvāj jñānābhidhānābhāva evañ cābhidhānābhidheyābhāvān naiva mukhyaḥ padārtho 'sti /
T06sthtvbhu:87: api ca sarva evāyaṃ gauṇa eva na mukhyo 'sti /
T06sthtvbhu:88: gauṇo hi nāma yo yatrāvidyamānena rūpeṇa pravartate /
T06sthtvbhu:89: sarvaś ca śabdaḥ pradhāne 'vidyamānenaiva guṇarūpeṇa pravartate ato mukhyo nāsty eva /
T06sthtvbhu:90: tatra yad uktaṃ asaty ātmani mukhye dharmeṣu copacāro na yukta iti tad ayuktam /
T06sthtvbhu:91: vijñānapariṇāmaḥ kati prabheda iti na jñāyate /
T06sthtvbhu:94: yatrātmādyupacāro dharmopacāraś ca sa punar hetubhāvena phalabhāvena ca bhidyate /
T06sthtvbhu:96: phalapariṇāmaḥ punar vipākavāsanāvṛttilābhād ālayavijñānasya pūrvakarmākṣepaparisamāptau yā nikāyasabhāgāntareṣv abhinirvṛttiḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:97: niṣyandavāsanāvṛttilābhāc ca yā pravṛttivijñānānāṃ kliṣṭasya ca manasa ālayavijñānād abhinirvṛttiḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:98: tatra pravṛttivijñānaṃ kuśalākuśalam ālayavijñāne vipākavāsanāṃ niṣyandavāsanāñ cādhatte /
T06sthtvbhu:99: avyākṛtaṃ kliṣṭañ ca mano niṣyandavāsanām eva /
T06sthtvbhu:100: yo 'sau trividhaḥ pariṇāma ukto 'sāv api na jñāyate /
T06sthtvbhu:102: vipāko mananākhyaś ca vijñaptir viṣayasya ca / 2ab
T06sthtvbhu:103: iti / sa eṣa trividhaḥ pariṇāmo vipākākhyo mananākhyo viṣayavijñaptyākhyaś ca /
T06sthtvbhu:107: tatsvarūpanirdeśam antareṇa na tat pratīyate ity ato yasya yat svarūpaṃ tad yathākramaṃ pradarśayann āha /
T06sthtvbhu:109: iti / tatreti yo 'yam anantaroktas trividhaḥ pariṇāmaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:110: ālayākhyam ity ālayavijñānasaṃjñakaṃ yad vijñānaṃ sa vipākapariṇāmaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:113: atha vālīyante upanibadhyante 'smin sarvadharmāḥ kāryabhāvena tad vālīyate upanibadhyate kāraṇabhāvena sarvadharmeṣv ity ālayaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:117: yadi pravṛttivijñānavyatiriktam ālayavijñānam asti tato 'syālambanam ākāro vā vaktavyaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:118: na hi nirālambanaṃ nirākāraṃ vā vijñānaṃ yujyate /
T06sthtvbhu:124: tatrādhyātmam upādānaṃ parikalpitasvabhāvābhiniveśavāsanā sādhiṣṭhānam indriyarūpaṃ nāma ca /
T06sthtvbhu:127: asaṃviditaka upādir yasmin asaṃviditakā ca sthānavijñaptir yasmin tad ālayavijñānam asaṃviditakopādisthānavijñaptikam /
T06sthtvbhu:130: tatsadbhāvād ālayavijñānenātmādivikalpo rūpādivikalpaś ca kāryatvenopātta iti tad vāsanātmādivikalpānāṃ rūpādivikalpānāñ copādir ity ucyate
T06sthtvbhu:131: so 'sminn idaṃ tad iti pratisaṃvedanākāreṇāsaṃvidita ity atas tad asaṃviditakopādir ity ucyate /
T06sthtvbhu:133: āśraya ātmabhāvaḥ sādhiṣṭhānam indriyarūpaṃ nāma ca /
T06sthtvbhu:134: tasya punar yad upādānam upagamanam ekayogakṣematvena tad upādiḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:136: ārūpyadhātau tu rūpavītarāgatvād rūpavipākānabhinirvṛtter nāmopādānam eva /
T06sthtvbhu:137: kin tu vāsanāvastham eva tatra rūpaṃ na vipākāvastham /
T06sthtvbhu:138: tat punar upādānam idantayā pratisaṃvedayitum aśakyam ity ato 'saṃvidita ity ucyate /
T06sthtvbhu:143: na ca nirodhasamāpattyādyavasthāsu vijñānaṃ naivāstīti śakyate pratipattum /
T06sthtvbhu:146: ity uktaṃ vijñānañ cāvaśyaṃ caittaiḥ saṃprayuktam ity ato vaktavyaṃ katamaiḥ katibhiś ca tebhyaḥ saṃprayujyate /
T06sthtvbhu:150: iti / sadeti yāvad ālayavijñānaṃ tāvad ebhiḥ sparśamanaskāravedanāsaṃjñācetanākhyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ sarvatragair dharmair anvitam / vedanā vit /
T06sthtvbhu:155: tasmin sati tatsamakālam evendriyasya sukhādivedanānukūlo yo vikāras tena [Tvbh_56] sadṛśo viṣayasya sukhādivedanīyākāraparicchedo yaḥ sa sparśaḥ
T06sthtvbhu:156: indriyaṃ punar yena viśeṣeṇa sukhaduḥkhādihetutvaṃ pratipadyate sa tasya vikāraḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:157: sparśaḥ punar indriyavikārasādṛśyenendriyaṃ spṛśatīndriyeṇa vā spṛśyata iti sparśa ucyate /
T06sthtvbhu:160: evaṃ hy uktaṃ sūtre sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhaṃ veditam iti vistaraḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:165: cittadhāraṇaṃ punas tatraivālambane punaḥ punaś cittasyāvarjanam /
T06sthtvbhu:166: etac ca karma cittasantater ālambananiyamena viśiṣṭaṃ manaskāram adhikṛtyoktaṃ na tu yaḥ praticittakṣaṇaṃ tasya hi pratikṣaṇam eva vyāpāro na kṣaṇāntare /
T06sthtvbhu:173: śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhavanty anenety anubhavaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:180: tatra sukho 'nubhavo yasminn utpanne viyogecchā niruddhe ca punaḥ saṃyogecchā jāyate /
T06sthtvbhu:181: duḥkho 'nubhavo yasminn utpanne viyogecchā niruddhe ca punar asaṃyogecchā /
T06sthtvbhu:182: aduḥkhāsukho yasminn utpanne niruddhe cobhyaṃ na jāyate /
T06sthtvbhu:186: tasyodgrahaṇaṃ nirūpaṇaṃ nīlam etan na pītam iti /
T06sthtvbhu:187: cetanā cittābhisaṃskāro manasaś ceṣṭā yasyāṃ satyām ālambanaṃ prati cetasaḥ praspanda iva bhavaty ayaskāntavaśād ayaḥpraspandavat /
T06sthtvbhu:188: vedanā trividhā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
T06sthtvbhu:189: dharmāś catuḥ prakārāḥ kuśalā akuśalā anivṛtāvyākṛtā nivṛtāvyākṛtāś ca /
T06sthtvbhu:190: tatrālayavijñāne vid iti sāmānyopadeśena na vijñāyate tisṝṇāṃ vedanānāṃ katamā vedanā /
T06sthtvbhu:191: tathā tad api kiṃ kuśalam akuśalam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtam iti na vijñāyata ity ata āha /
T06sthtvbhu:194: upekṣaivālayavijñāne vedanā na sukhā na duḥkhā tayoḥ paricchinnālambanākāratvād rāgadveṣānuśayitatvāc ca /
T06sthtvbhu:202: yathālayavijñānam ekāntena vipāko 'paricchinnālambanākāraṃ sadā sparśādibhir anvitaṃ
T06sthtvbhu:203: tatra copekṣaiva vedanānivṛtāvyākṛtañ ca tathā sparśādayo 'py ekāntena vipākā evāparicchinnālambanākārāś ca /
T06sthtvbhu:204: ātmānaṃ hitvetaraiś caturbhir ālayavijñānena ca nityam anugatās teṣu copekṣaiva vedanānivṛtāvyākṛtāś cālayavijñānavat /
T06sthtvbhu:205: na hi vipākena saṃprayuktānām avipākatvam aparicchinnālambanākāreṇa ca paricchinnālambanākāratvaṃ saṃbhavati /
T06sthtvbhu:207: kiṃ punas tad ālayavijñānam ekam abhinnam āsaṃsāram anuvartate /
T06sthtvbhu:209: na hi tad ekam abhinnam anuvartate kṣaṇikatvāt /
T06sthtvbhu:214: udakasamūhasya pūrvāparabhāgāvicchedena pravāha ogha ity ucyate /
T06sthtvbhu:215: yathā hy oghas tṛṇakāṣṭhagomayādīn ākarṣayaṅ gacchaty evam ālayavijñānam api puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyakarmavāsanānugataṃ
T06sthtvbhu:216: sparśamanaskārādīn ākarṣan srotasāsaṃsāram avyuparataṃ pravartata iti /
T06sthtvbhu:217: tasyaivaṃ śrotasā pravṛttasya kasyām avasthāyāṃ vyāvṛttir ity āha /
T06sthtvbhu:221: kasya punar yogād arhann ity ucyate /
T06sthtvbhu:223: tasyāṃ hy avasthāyām ālayavijñānāśritadauṣṭhulyaniravaśeṣaprahāṇād ālayavijñānaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ bhavati /
T06sthtvbhu:228: tatra yathā cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ cakṣurādaya āśrayatvena rūpādayaś cālambanatvena prasiddhā naiva kliṣṭasya manasa āśraya ālambanaṃ vā prasiddham
T06sthtvbhu:229: na ca vijñānam āśrayālambananirapekṣaṃ yujyata ity ataḥ kliṣṭasya manasa āśrayālambanapratipādanārthaṃ niruktipratipādanārthañ cāha /
T06sthtvbhu:232: tad āśritya pravartata iti tacchabdenālayavijñānam abhisaṃbadhyate /
T06sthtvbhu:233: tadvāsanāśrayo hy ālayavijñānam atas tad āśritya pravartate santānenotpadyata ity arthaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:234: atha vā yasmin dhātau bhūmau vālayavijñānaṃ vipākas tad api kliṣṭaṃ manas taddhātukaṃ tadbhūmikaṃ ceti tatpratibaddhavṛttitvāt tad āśritya pravartate
T06sthtvbhu:235: tadālambam ity ālayavijñānālambanam eva satkāyadṛṣṭyādibhiḥ saṃprayogād ahaṃ mamety ālayavijñānālambanatvāt /
T06sthtvbhu:236: kathaṃ punar yata eva cittād utpadyate tad eva tadālambanaṃ bhavati /
T06sthtvbhu:237: yathā tad anicchatāṃ keṣāṃcit kasyāñcid avasthāyāṃ yata eva cittān manovijñānam utpadyate tadālambanam eva tad utpadyate /
T06sthtvbhu:238: manonāma vijñānam iti mana iti nāma ākhyā yasya vijñānasya tad ālayavijñānam āśritya pravarte tadālambanaṃ ca manonāmety anenālayavijñānāt pravṛttivijñānāc ca vyavacchinatti /
T06sthtvbhu:239: tat punaḥ kiṃ svabhāvam ity āha /
T06sthtvbhu:241: evaṃ mananātmakatvān mana ity ucyate nairūktena vidhinā /
T06sthtvbhu:243: idaṃ tu na jñāyate katamais tac caittaiḥ kiyadbhiḥ kiyantaṃ kālaṃ vā saṃprayujyata ity ata āha /
T06sthtvbhu:245: caittā hi dviprakārāḥ kleśās tad anye ca /
T06sthtvbhu:248: na ca taiḥ saṃprayujyate 'taś caturbhir ity āha /
T06sthtvbhu:253: na hi nivṛtena vijñānenākuśalānāṃ saṃprayogaḥ saṃbhavati /
T06sthtvbhu:257: yāvat tad asti tāvat taiḥ saṃprayuktam /
T06sthtvbhu:258: sāmānyanirdeśād viśeṣato na jñāyanta iti viśeṣato nirdiśati /
T06sthtvbhu:260: upādānaskandheṣv ātmeti darśanam ātmadṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭir ity arthaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:265: tatrālayavijñānasvarūpe saṃmūḍhaḥ sann ālayavijñāne ātmadṛṣṭim utpādayati /
T06sthtvbhu:267: etasmiṃs traye saty ātmābhimate vastuni yo 'bhiṣvaṅgaḥ sa ātmasnehaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:271: viparyāsanimittaṃ tu manaḥ kliṣṭaṃ sadaiva tat /
T06sthtvbhu:273: ete hy ātmamohādayaḥ kleśā manovan navabhūmikāḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:274: iha ca sāmānyenābhidhānān na jñāyate kiṃ svabhūmikair eva saṃprayujyate /
T06sthtvbhu:278: tanmayair iti yatra dhātau bhūmau vā jātas taddhātukais tadbhūmikair eva ca saṃprayujyate /
T06sthtvbhu:280: kiṃ punaś caturbhir eva kleśaiḥ saṃprayujyate / nety āha /
T06sthtvbhu:285: ete hi pañca dharmāḥ sarvatragatvāt sarvavijñānaiḥ saṃprayujyante /
T06sthtvbhu:286: etair api yatra jātas tanmayair eva saṃprayujyate nānyadhātubhūmikaiḥ /

T06sthtvbhu:609: kāyasandhāraṇāsamarthā vā vṛttiś cetaso 'svatantrā sā yato bhavati tan middham /
T06sthtvbhu:611: etac ca mohāṃśe prajñapanān mohāṃśikaṃ kṛtyātipattisaṃniśrayadānakarmakañ ca /
T06sthtvbhu:617: cetanāprajñāviśeṣa iti cetanāyāś cittaparispandātmakatvāt prajñāyāś ca guṇadoṣavivekākāratvāt /
T06sthtvbhu:618: tadvaśena cittapravṛtteḥ kadācic cittacetanayor vitarkaḥ prajñaptiḥ kadācit prajñācetasor yathākramam anabhyūhābhyuhāvasthayoḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:619: atha vā cetanāprajñayor eva vitarkaḥ prajñaptis tadvaśena cittasya tathāpravṛttatvāt /
T06sthtvbhu:632: ete ca catvāro dharmā dvidhā kliṣṭā akliṣṭāś ca /
T06sthtvbhu:633: tatrākuśalam akṛtvā kuśalañ ca kṛtvā yaś cetaso vilekhas tat saṃkliṣṭaṃ kaukṛtyam /
T06sthtvbhu:634: yat kuśalam akṛtvākuśalañ ca kṛtvā tat kaukṛtyam akliṣṭam /
T06sthtvbhu:635: middham api kliṣṭacittāviddhaṃ kliṣṭacittasaṃprayuktaṃ ca kliṣṭam /
T06sthtvbhu:641: tatra ye kaukṛtyamiddhavitarkavicārāḥ kliṣṭās ta evopakleśā netare /
T06sthtvbhu:642: tatra yathā rūpaśabdādyupalabdhiḥ ṣaṭprakārā yathāsaṃbhavaṃ sarvaiś caitasikaiḥ saṃprayujyate
T06sthtvbhu:643: sarvatragair viniyataiḥ kuśalaiḥ kleśair upakleśaiś ca evaṃ trivedanā tisṛbhiś ca

T06sthtvbhu:645: saumanasyadaurmanasyopekṣāsthānīyeṣu rūpādiṣu tadutpatteḥ kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā ca /
T06sthtvbhu:646: ālayavijñānan tu sarvatragaiḥ pañcabhir eva saṃprayujyate nānyaiḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:648: kliṣṭaṃ manaḥ sarvatragaiḥ pañcabhiś caturbhiś ca kleśair ātmamohādibhiḥ sadā saṃprayujyate /
T06sthtvbhu:651: kiṃ pañcānāñ cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ yugapad ālambanapratyayasānnidhye 'py ālayavijñānād ekasyaivotpattir bhavati na dvayor na bahūnāṃ vā /
T06sthtvbhu:653: na dvayor na bahūnāṃ vā yugapat samanantarapratyayābhāvād ekasyaiva vijñānasyotpattir bhavati /
T06sthtvbhu:654: na caikaṃ vijñānaṃ bahūnāṃ samantarapratyayatvaṃ pratipattum utsahate /
T06sthtvbhu:657: evaṃ dvayor bahūnāñ ca pratyayasāṃnidhye utpattir bhavatīty ata āha /
T06sthtvbhu:659: vijñānānāṃ saha na vā taraṅgāṇāṃ yathā jale // 15
T06sthtvbhu:661: pañcānāṃ cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ bījāśrayatvāt tadutpatter gatiṣu janmopādānāc cālayavijñānaṃ mūlavijñānam ity ucyate /
T06sthtvbhu:662: yathāpratyayam udbhava iti yasya yasya yaḥ pratyayaḥ saṃnihitas tasya tasya niyamenodbhava ātmalābhaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:663: saha na veti yugapat krameṇa vā /
T06sthtvbhu:664: taraṅgāṇāṃ yathā jala ity ālayavijñānāt pravṛttivijñānānāṃ yugapad ayugapac cotpattau dṛṣṭāntaḥ / yathoktam /
T06sthtvbhu:665: tadyathā viśālamate mahata udakaughasya vahataḥ saced ekasya
T06sthtvbhu:674: evam eva viśālamate tadoghasthānīyam ālayavijñānaṃ saṃniśritya
T06sthtvbhu:676: pratyupasthito bhavaty ekam eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ pravartate /
T06sthtvbhu:677: saced dvayos trayāṇāṃ sacet pañcānāṃ vijñānānām utpattipratyayaḥ
T06sthtvbhu:678: pratyupasthito bhavati sakṛd yāvat pañcānāṃ pravṛttir bhavati /
T06sthtvbhu:680: ādānavijñāna gabhīrasūkṣmo ogho yathā vartati sarvabījo /
T06sthtvbhu:681: bālāna eṣo mayi na prakāśi mā haiva ātmā parikalpayeyur
T06sthtvbhu:682: iti / na hi vijñānapratiniyamenālambanapratyayavat samanantarapratyaya iṣyate /
T06sthtvbhu:684: ata ekasmād api samanantarapratyayād ālambanapratyayasānnidhye dvayor bahūnāṃ vā vijñānānām utpattir na virūdhyate /
T06sthtvbhu:686: pañcānāñ ca yugapad ālambanapratyayasānnidhya ekenaivotpattavyaṃ na pañcabhir apīti /
T06sthtvbhu:687: tasmād alambanasadbhāve pañcānām api cotpattir ity abhyupeyam /
T06sthtvbhu:689: kiṃ manovijñānaṃ cakṣurādivijñānaiḥ saha pravartate vinā ca /
T06sthtvbhu:693: iti / sarvadeti sarvakālaṃ cakṣurādivijñānaiḥ saha vinā cety arthaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:696: samāpattidvayān middhān mūrcchanād apy acittakād iti / (16bd)
T06sthtvbhu:697: tatrāsaṃjñikam asaṃjñisattveṣu deveṣūpapannasya yaś cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:700: tṛtīyād dhyānād vītarāgasyordhvam avītarāgasya niḥsaraṇasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇa manovijñānasya tatsaṃprayuktānāñ ca caittānāṃ yo nirodhaḥ so 'trāsaṃjñisamāpattir ity ucyate /
T06sthtvbhu:704: sa ca samāpatticittād anantarañ cittāntarotpattiviruddha āśrayaḥ prāpyata iti samāpattir ity ucyate /
T06sthtvbhu:705: nirodhasamāpattir ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasya śāntavihārasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇa sasaṃprayogasya manovijñānasya kliṣṭasya ca manaso yo nirodhaḥ
T06sthtvbhu:707: acittakaṃ middhaṃ gāḍhamiddhopahatatvād āśrayasya tāvatkālaṃ manovijñānāpravṛtter acittakam ity ucyate /
T06sthtvbhu:711: etāḥ pañcāvasthā varjayitvā tadanyāsu sarvāsv avasthāsu manovijñānapravṛttir veditavyā /
T06sthtvbhu:712: evam āsaṃjñikādiṣu manovijñāne niruddhe tadapagame punaḥ kuta utpadyate yatas tasya kālakriyā na bhavati /
T06sthtvbhu:715: yatra vijñānapariṇāme ātmadharmopacāraḥ sa punas tridhety uddiśya vistareṇa trividho 'pi nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:716: idānīm ātmadharmopacāro yaḥ pravartate sa vijñānapariṇāma eva na vijñānapariṇāmāc ca pṛthag asty ātmā dharmā ceti yat pratijñātaṃ tatprasādhanārtham āha /
T06sthtvbhu:718: tena tan nāsti tenedaṃ sarvaṃ vijñāptimātrakam // 17
T06sthtvbhu:719: iti / yo 'yaṃ vijñānapariṇāmas trividho 'nantaram abhihitaḥ so 'yaṃ vikalpaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:720: adhyāropitārthākārās traidhātukāś cittacaittā vikalpa ucyate / yathoktam /
T06sthtvbhu:722: tena trividhena vikalpenālayavijñānakliṣṭamanaḥpravṛttivijñānasvabhāvena sasaṃprayogeṇa yad vikalpyate bhājanam ātmāskandhadhātvāyatanarūpaśabdādikaṃ
T06sthtvbhu:723: vastu tan nāstīty ataḥ sa vijñānapariṇāmo vikalpa ucyate /
T06sthtvbhu:725: kathaṃ punar etad vijñāyate tadālambanam asad iti /
T06sthtvbhu:726: yad dhi yasya kāraṇaṃ tasmin samagre cāviruddhe ca tad utpadyate nānyathā /
T06sthtvbhu:727: vijñānañ ca māyāgandharvanagarasvapnatimirādāv asaty apyālambane jāyate /
T06sthtvbhu:728: yadi ca vijñānasyālambanapratibaddha utpādaḥ syād evaṃ sati māyādiṣv arthābhāvān na vijñānam utpadyate /
T06sthtvbhu:729: tasmāt pūrvakān niruddhāt tajjātīyavijñānād vijñānam utpadyate /
T06sthtvbhu:730: na bāhyād arthāt tasminn asaty api bhāvāt /
T06sthtvbhu:731: dṛṣṭā cābhinne 'py arthe pratipattṝṇāṃ parasparaviruddhā pratipattiḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:733: tasmād adhyāropitarūpatvād vikalpasyālambanam asad iti pratipattavyam /
T06sthtvbhu:737: yasmāt pariṇāmātmakena vikalpena yad vikalpyate tena tan nāsti tasmād viṣayābhāvāt sarvaṃ vijñaptimātrakam /
T06sthtvbhu:741: yadi sarvaṃ vijñaptimātrakam eva na tato 'nyaḥ kartā karaṇaṃ vāsti kathaṃ mūlavijñānād anadhiṣṭhitād asati karaṇe vikalpāḥ pravartanta ity āha
T06sthtvbhu:742: sarvabījaṃ hi vijñānaṃ pariṇāmas tathā tathā /
T06sthtvbhu:743: yāty anyonyavaśād yena vikalpaḥ sa sa jāyate // 18
T06sthtvbhu:744: tatra sarvadharmotpādanaśaktyanugamāt sarvabījaṃ vijñānam ity ālayavijñānam /
T06sthtvbhu:745: vijñānaṃ hy asarvabījam apy astīty ataḥ sarvabījam ity āha /
T06sthtvbhu:746: vijñānād anyad api kaiścit pradhānādi sarvabījaṃ kalpyata iti vijñānam ity āha /
T06sthtvbhu:749: pariṇāmas tathā tathā yāty anyonyavaśād iti / (18bc)
T06sthtvbhu:751: tathā tatheti tasya tasya vikalpasyānantarotpādanasamarthāvasthāṃ prāpnotīty arthaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:753: tathā hi cakṣurādivijñānaṃ svaśaktiparipoṣe vartamāne śaktiviśiṣṭasyālayavijñānapariṇāmasya nimittaṃ so 'pi ālayavijñānapariṇāmaś cakṣurādivijñānasya nimittaṃ bhavati /
T06sthtvbhu:754: evam anyonyavaśād yasmād ubhayaṃ pravartate tasmād ālayavijñānād anyenānadhiṣṭhitād anekaprakāro vikalpaḥ sa sa jāyate /
T06sthtvbhu:755: tatra ca vartamāne janmani yathālayavijñānāt pravṛttivijñānasyotpattir bhavati tathākhyātam /
T06sthtvbhu:756: idānīṃ vijñaptimātre anāgataṃ janma vartamānajanmanirodhe sati yathā pratisaṃdhīyate tat pradarśayann āha /
T06sthtvbhu:760: tena karmaṇā yad anāgatātmabhāvābhinirvṛttaye ālayavijñāne sāmarthyam āhitaṃ sā karmavāsanā /
T06sthtvbhu:762: tatra vijñānāt pṛthag eva svasantānādhyāsitaṃ grāhyam astīty adhyavasāyo grāhyagrāhaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:763: tac ca vijñānena pratīyate vijñāyate gṛhyata iti yo 'yaṃ niścayaḥ sa grahakagrāhaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:766: grāhadvayavāsanā tu sarvakarmavāsanānāṃ yathāsvam ākṣiptātmabhāvotpādane pravṛttānāṃ sahakāritvaṃ pratipadyate /
T06sthtvbhu:768: evañ ca na kevalāḥ karmavāsanā grāhadvayavāsanānanugṛhītā vipākañ janayantīty uktaṃ bhavati /
T06sthtvbhu:771: kṣīṇe pūrvavipāke 'nyaṃ vipākaṃ janayanti tad iti / (19cd)
T06sthtvbhu:772: pūrvajanmopacitena karmaṇā ya iti vipāko 'bhinirvṛttas tasmin kṣīṇa ity ākṣepakāle
T06sthtvbhu:773: paryantāvasthite yathābalaṃ karmavāsanā grāhadvayavāsanāsahitā upabhūktād vipākād
T06sthtvbhu:776: kṣīṇe pūrvavipāka ity anena śāśvatāntaṃ pariharati /
T06sthtvbhu:779: tad eva ca sarvabījakaṃ na cakṣurādivijñānam iti kuta etat /
T06sthtvbhu:783: tasmin sati gatiḥ sarvā nirvāṇādhigamo 'pi ca //
T06sthtvbhu:784: na cālayavijñānam antareṇa saṃsārapravṛttir nivṛttir vā yujyate /
T06sthtvbhu:787: tatrālayavijñānād anyat saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ na yujyate /
T06sthtvbhu:789: saṃsārasyālayavijñānānabhyupagame pratisandhivijñānaṃ vā saṃskārapratyayaṃ parikalpyeta saṃskāraparibhāvitā vā ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:790: tatra ye saṃskārāḥ prātisaṃdhikavijñānapratyayatveneṣyante teṣāñ ciraniruddhatvān
T06sthtvbhu:791: niruddhasya cāsatvād asataś ca pratyayatvābhāvān na saṃskārapratyayaṃ pratisandhivijñānaṃ yujyate /
T06sthtvbhu:792: pratisandhau ca nāmarūpam apy asti na kevalaṃ vijñānam /
T06sthtvbhu:793: tatra vijñānam eva saṃskārapratyayaṃ na nāmarūpam iti kā tatra yuktiḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:797: yad uttarakālam iti cet tasya prātisandhikanāmarūpāt ka ātmātiśayo yatas tad eva vijñānapratyayaṃ na pūrvam /
T06sthtvbhu:799: ataś ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam evāstu kiṃ pratisandhivijñānenāṅgāntareṇa parikalpitena /
T06sthtvbhu:802: saṃskāraparibhāvitā vā ṣaḍvijñānakāyā api na saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ yujyate /
T06sthtvbhu:804: na hi vijñānaṃ vipākavāsanāṃ niṣyandavāsanāṃ vā svātmany ādhātuṃ samarthaṃ svātmani kāritravirodhāt /
T06sthtvbhu:808: acittikāsu ca nirodhasamāpattyādyavasthāsu punaḥ saṃskāraparibhāvitacittotpattyasaṃbhavād vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na syāt /
T06sthtvbhu:810: evaṃ yāvaj jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ na syāt /
T06sthtvbhu:811: tataś ca saṃsārapravṛttir eva na syāt /
T06sthtvbhu:812: tasmād avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārās tadadhivāsitañ cālayavijñānaṃ saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam /
T06sthtvbhu:813: tatpratyayaṃ pratisandhau nāmarūpam ity eṣaiva nītir anavadyā /
T06sthtvbhu:814: saṃsāranivṛttir api ālayavijñāne asati na yujyate /
T06sthtvbhu:815: saṃsārasya hi karmakleśāś ca kāraṇaṃ tayoś ca kleśāḥ pradhānam /
T06sthtvbhu:816: tathā hi kleśādhipatyāt karma punarbhavākṣepasamarthaṃ bhavati nānyathā /
T06sthtvbhu:817: tathākṣiptapunarbhavo 'pi karma kleśādhipatyād eva punarbhavo bhavati nānyathā /
T06sthtvbhu:818: evañ ca kleśā eva saṃsārapravṛtteḥ pradhānatvān mūlam /
T06sthtvbhu:819: atas teṣu prahīṇeṣu saṃsāro vinivartate nānyathā /
T06sthtvbhu:822: saṃmukhībhūto vā kleśaḥ prahīyate bījāvastho vā /
T06sthtvbhu:823: tatra saṃmukhībhūtaḥ prahīyata ity aniṣṭir eveyam /
T06sthtvbhu:825: na hi pratipakṣāt tadānīṃ kiñcid anyad abhyupagamyate yatra kleśabījaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tatpratipakṣeṇa prahīyeta /
T06sthtvbhu:827: na hi tat kleśabījānuṣaktam eva tatpratipakṣo bhavitum arhati /
T06sthtvbhu:829: tasmād avaśyam ālayavijñānaṃ tadanyavijñānasahabhūbhiḥ kleśopakleśair bhāvyate svabījapuṣṭyādhānata ity abhyupeyam /
T06sthtvbhu:830: ye punaś cittata eva saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣād yathābalaṃ vāsanāvṛttilābhe sati kleśopakleśāḥ
T06sthtvbhu:831: pravartante teṣāñ cālayavijñānavyavasthitaṃ bījaṃ tatsahabhuvā kleśapratipakṣamārgeṇāpanīyate /
T06sthtvbhu:832: tasmiṃś cāpanīte na punas tenāśrayeṇa kleśānām utpattir iti sopadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhātuḥ prāpyate /
T06sthtvbhu:834: na hi karma vidyamānam api kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣu sahakārikāraṇabhāvāt punarbhavam abhinirvartayituṃ samartham /
T06sthtvbhu:835: evam ālayavijñāne sati saṃsārapravṛttir nivṛttiś ca nānyathety avaśyaṃ cakṣurādivijñānavyatiriktam
T06sthtvbhu:836: ālayavijñānaṃ tad eva ca sarvadharmabījānugataṃ na cakṣurādivijñānam ity abhyupagantavyam /
T06sthtvbhu:838: yadi vijñaptimātram evedaṃ kathaṃ na sūtravirodhaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:839: sūtreṣu hi trayaḥ svabhāvā uktāḥ parikalpitaḥ paratantraḥ pariniṣpannaś ca /
T06sthtvbhu:844: yena yena vikalpena yad yad vastu vikalpyate /
T06sthtvbhu:845: parikalpita evāsau svabhāvo na sa vidyate // 20
T06sthtvbhu:849: ādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vāntaśo yāvad buddhadharmā api /
T06sthtvbhu:853: yad vastu vikalpyaviṣayas tad yasmāt sattābhāvān na vidyate /
T06sthtvbhu:856: tathā hy ekasmin vastuni tadabhāve ca parasparaviruddhānekavikalpapravṛttir dṛṣṭā /
T06sthtvbhu:857: na ca tad ekaṃ vastu tadabhāvo vā parasparaviruddhānekasvabhāvo yujyate /
T06sthtvbhu:858: tasmāt sarvam idaṃ vikalpamātram eva tadarthasya parikalpitarūpatvāt /
T06sthtvbhu:860: na khalu punaḥ subhūte dharmās tathā vidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā abhiniviṣṭā iti /
T06sthtvbhu:861: parikalpitānantaraṃ paratantrasvabhāvo vaktavya iti / ata āha /
T06sthtvbhu:863: atra ca vikalpa iti paratantrasvarūpam āha /
T06sthtvbhu:869: parair hetupratyayais tantryata iti paratantra utpādyata ity arthaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:873: niṣpannas tasya pūrveṇa sadā rahitatā tu yā // 21cd
T06sthtvbhu:875: tasyeti paratantrasya pūrveṇeti parikalpitena tasmin vikalpe grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ parikalpitaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:876: tathā hi tasmin vikalpe grāhyagrāhakatvam avidyamānam eva parikalpyata iti parikalpitam ucyate /
T06sthtvbhu:877: tena grāhyagrāhakeṇa paratantrasya sadā sarvakālam atyantarahitatā yā sa pariniṣpannasvabhāvaḥ //
T06sthtvbhu:878: ata eva sa naivānyo nānanyaḥ paratantrataḥ / 22ab
T06sthtvbhu:879: ata eva sa naiveti parikalpitena svabhāvena paratantrasya sadā rahitatā pariniṣpannaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:881: sā ca dharmatā dharmān nānyā nānanyā yujyate /
T06sthtvbhu:882: pariniṣpannaś ca paratantradharmatety ataḥ paratantrāt pariniṣpanno nānyo nānanya iti boddhavyaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:883: yadi hi pariniṣpannaḥ paratantrād anyaḥ syād evaṃ na parikalpitena paratantraḥ śūnyaḥ syāt /
T06sthtvbhu:884: athānanya evam api pariniṣpanno na viśuddhālambanaḥ syāt paratantravat saṃkleśātmakatvāt /
T06sthtvbhu:885: evaṃ paratantraś ca na kleśātmakaḥ syāt /
T06sthtvbhu:894: athānanyā evam api saṃskārāḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvarūpāḥ syur anityatāvat /
T06sthtvbhu:896: yadi grāhyagrāhakabhāvarahitaḥ paratantraḥ katham asau gṛhyate agṛhyamāṇo vā katham astīti vijñāyate / ata āha /
T06sthtvbhu:898: nādṛṣṭe 'sminn iti pariniṣpannasvabhāve sa dṛśyata iti paratantraḥ svabhāvaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:899: nirvikalpalokottarajñānadṛśye pariniṣpanne svabhāve adṛṣṭe apratividdhe asākṣātkṛte tatpṛṣṭhalabdhaśuddhalaukikajñānagamyatvāt paratantro 'nyena jñānena na gṛhyate /
T06sthtvbhu:901: na punar lokottarajñānapṛṣṭhalabdhenāpi jñānena na dṛśyate /
T06sthtvbhu:907: nirvikalpena jñānenākāśasamatayā tān sarvadharmān paśyatīti paratantradharmāṇāṃ tathatāmātradarśanāt //
T06sthtvbhu:908: yadi dravyam eva paratantraḥ kathaṃ sūtre sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvā anutpannā aniruddhā iti nirdiśyante /
T06sthtvbhu:912: traya eva svabhāvā na caturtho 'stīti jñāpanārthaṃ saṃkhyānirdeśaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:913: svena svena lakṣaṇena vidyamānavad bhavatīti svbhāvaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:914: trividhā niḥsvabhāvatā lakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatā utpattiniḥsvabhāvatā paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatā ca /
T06sthtvbhu:916: idānīṃ trividhasya svabhāvasya yā yasya niḥsvabhāvatā tāṃ tasya pradarśayann āha /
T06sthtvbhu:919: dharmāṇāṃ paramārthaś ca sa yatas tathatāpi saḥ / 25ab
T06sthtvbhu:920: prathamaḥ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo 'yaṃ ca lakṣaṇenaiva niḥsvabhāvas tallakṣaṇasyotprekṣitatvāt /
T06sthtvbhu:923: ataś ca svarūpābhāvāt khapuṣpavat svarūpeṇaiva niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:926: ataś ca yathā prakhyāti tathāsyotpattir nāstīty ato 'syotpattiniḥsvabhāvatety ucyate /
T06sthtvbhu:927: dharmāṇāṃ paramārthaś ca sa yatas tathāpi sa iti / (25ab)
T06sthtvbhu:928: paramaṃ hi lokottarajñānaṃ niruttaratvāt tasyārthaḥ paramārthaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:929: atha vākāśavat sarvatraikarasārthena vaimalyāvikārārthena ca pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvaḥ paramārtha ucyate /
T06sthtvbhu:930: sa yasmāt pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ paratantrātmakānāṃ paramārthaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:931: taddharmateti kṛtvā tasmāt pariniṣpanna eva svabhāvaḥ paramārthaniḥsvabhāvātā pariniṣpannasyābhāvasvabhāvatvāt /
T06sthtvbhu:936: kiṃ tarhi yāvanto dharmadhātuparyāyāḥ sarvais tair apy abhidhātavya iti //
T06sthtvbhu:938: tathatā / tathā hi pṛthagjanaśaikṣāśaikṣāvasthāsu sarvakālaṃ tathaiva bhavati /
T06sthtvbhu:940: kiṃ punas tathatāvat pariniṣpanna eva vijñaptimātratā /
T06sthtvbhu:944: nāmni tiṣṭhati tac cittaṃ tadā tanmātradarśanāt /
T06sthtvbhu:945: nāmni sthānāc ca vijñaptāv upalambhaḥ prahīyate //
T06sthtvbhu:948: iti / saiva vijñaptimātratety anena vacanenābhisamaya uktaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:949: yadi vijñaptimātram evedaṃ kasmāc cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanasparśanaiḥ rūpaśabdagandharasasparśān gṛhṇātīty asya bhavatīty ata āha /
T06sthtvbhu:952: atha vā yās tāḥ karmavāsanā grāhadvayavāsanāsahitāḥ
T06sthtvbhu:954: uktaṃ tasmāt kathaṃ prahāṇam aprahāṇaṃ cety ata āha /
T06sthtvbhu:957: yāvac cittadharmatāyāṃ vijñaptimātrasaṃśabditāyāṃ vijñānaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate kiṃ tarhi grāhyagrāhakopalambhe carati /
T06sthtvbhu:960: yāvad advayalakṣaṇe vijñaptimātratve yoginaś cittaṃ na pratiṣṭhitaṃ bhavati tāvad grāhyagrāhakānuśayo na vinivartate na prahīyata ity arthaḥ
T06sthtvbhu:962: ato 'syaivam bhavaty ahaṃ cakṣurādibhiḥ rūpādīn gṛhṇāmīti /
T06sthtvbhu:963: idam idānīṃ vaktavyaṃ kim artharahitacittamātropalambhāc cittadharmatāvasthānam /
T06sthtvbhu:965: vijñaptimātram evedam ity api hy upalambhataḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:967: iti atha vā yaḥ punar ābhimānikaḥ śrutamātrakeṇa jānīyad ahaṃ vijñaptimātratāyāṃ śuddhāyāṃ sthita iti tadgrahavyudāsārtham āha /
T06sthtvbhu:968: vijñaptimātram evedam ity api hy upalambhata ity (27ab)
T06sthtvbhu:969: ādi / vijñaptimātram evedaṃ artharahitaṃ na bāhyo 'rtho 'stīty evam upalambhato grahaṇataḥ
T06sthtvbhu:970: citrīkaraṇata ity artho 'grata ity abhimukhaṃ [Tvbh_136] sthāpayann iti yathāśrutaṃ manasā
T06sthtvbhu:971: bahuprakāratvād yogācārālambanānāṃ kiṃcid ity āhāsthisaṃkalikaṃ vā vinīlakaṃ vā vipūyakaṃ vā vipaḍumakaṃ vā vyādhmātakādikaṃ vā tanmātre nāvatiṣṭhate vijñānopalambhāprahāṇāt /
T06sthtvbhu:972: kadā punar vijñānagrāhasya prahāṇaṃ cittadharmātāyāñ ca pratiṣṭhito bhavatīty ata āha /
T06sthtvbhu:973: yadā tv ālambanaṃ jñānaṃ naivopalabhate tadā /
T06sthtvbhu:975: yasmin kāle deśanālambanaṃ avavādālambanaṃ prākṛtaṃ vā rūpaśabdādyālambanaṃ jñānaṃ
T06sthtvbhu:976: bahiś cittān nopalabhate na paśyati na gṛhṇāti nābhiniviśate yathābhūtārthadarśanān
T06sthtvbhu:977: na tu jātyandhavat tasmin kāle vijñānagrāhasya prahāṇaṃ svacittadharmatāyāṃ ca pratiṣṭhito bhavati /
T06sthtvbhu:980: grāhye sati grāhako bhavati na tu grāhyābhāva iti /
T06sthtvbhu:983: evaṃ hi [Tvbh_138] samasamālambyālambakaṃ nirvikalpaṃ lokottaraṃ jñānam utpadyate /
T06sthtvbhu:984: grāhyagrāhakābhiniveśānuśayāḥ prahīyante svacittadharmatāyāṃ ca cittam avasthitaṃ bhavati /
T06sthtvbhu:985: yadaivaṃ vijñaptimātratāyāṃ cittam avasthitaṃ bhavati tadā kathaṃ vyapadiśyata ity āha /
T06sthtvbhu:988: sa evānāsravo dhātur acintyaḥ kuśalo dhruvaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:990: iti / tad anena ślokadvayena darśanamārgam ārabhyottaraviśeṣagatyā phalasaṃpattir udbhāvitā vijñaptimātratāpraviṣṭayoginaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:993: anucitatvāl loke samudācārābhāvān nirvikalpatvāc ca lokād uttīrṇam iti
T06sthtvbhu:995: tasya jñānasyānantaraṃ āśrayasya parāvṛttir bhavatīti jñāpanārtham āha /
T06sthtvbhu:998: tasya parāvṛttir yā dauṣṭhulyavipākadvayavāsanābhāvena nivṛttau satyāṃ karmaṇyatādharmakāyādvayajñānabhāvena parāvṛttiḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:999: sā punar āśrayaparāvṛttiḥ kasya prahāṇāt prāpyate / ata āha /
T06sthtvbhu:1004: sā punar āśrayaparāvṛttiḥ śrāvakādigatadauṣṭhulyahānitaś ca prāpyate yad āha vimuktikāya iti /
T06sthtvbhu:1007: dvidhā āvaraṇabhedena sottarā niruttarā cāśrayaparāvṛttir uktā /
T06sthtvbhu:1010: sarvabījaṃ kleśabījaṃ bandhas tatra dvayor dvayoḥ //
T06sthtvbhu:1012: ādyasya kleśabījaṃ itarasya dvayāvaraṇabījaṃ tadudghātāt sarvajñatāvāptir bhavatīti /
T06sthtvbhu:1022: sukho nityatvād eva yad anityaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ ayaṃ ca nitya iti tasmāt sukhaḥ /
T06sthtvbhu:1024: sa evāśrayaparāvṛttilakṣaṇo dharmākhyo 'py ucyate mahāmuner bhūmipāramitābhāvanayā kleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇāt /
T06sthtvbhu:1026: saṃsārāparityāgāt tadanupasaṃkleśatvād bodhisattvānāṃ sarvadharmavibhutvalābhataś ca dharmakāya ity ucyate /
T06sthtvbhu:1027: mahāmuner iti paramauneyayogād buddho bhagavān mahāmunir iti //
